content.raw: Gitkraken was in private beta when I tried it, had to get an invite to check it out, which I was eager to do since it looked like it had more potential than other tools. I wasn't happy with it, but it's been a few years so I should see whether it's improved. Haven't tried sourcetree, since it doesn't work on linux.
